schema.description: This view joins data from multiple SAP S4 HANA tables (EKKO, EKPO, EKKN, EKBE, TCURX, TCURR) to provide a comprehensive overview of purchase documents.  It includes details on header and item data, goods receipts, invoice receipts, and currency conversions. The data is at the level of individual purchase order items.

description.value: Reason Flag for OTB Check Status
Distribution Using Target Value or Item Data
Numerator for Conversion of Order Unit to Base Unit
Denominator for Conversion of Order Unit to Base Unit
Goods Receipt Processing Time in Days
Number of Days for First Reminder
Number of Days for Second Reminder
Number of Days for Third Reminder
Distribution Flag for multiple account assignment
Item Number of Principal Purchase Agreement
Reconciliation Date for Agreed Cumulative Quantity
Exclusion in Outline Agreement Item with Material Class
Target Value for Outline Agreement in Document Currency
Manual address number in purchasing document item
Item Does Not Qualify for Cash Discount
Flag Print relevant Schedule lines exist
Item number of the settlement reservation
Quality inspection Flag cannot be changed
Control Key for Quality Management in Procurement
Business area reported to the partner
assumed business area of the business partner
Higher level item in purchasing documents
Location for a physical handover of goods
Material ledger activated at material level
Special stock flag for physical stock transfer
Subtotal 1 from pricing procedure for condition
Subtotal 2 from pricing procedure for condition
Subtotal 3 from pricing procedure for condition
Subtotal 4 from pricing procedure for condition
Subtotal 5 from pricing procedure for condition
Subtotal 6 from pricing procedure for condition
Delivery type for returns to vendors
Material qualifies for discount in kind
Flag item relevant to JIT delivery schedules
No invoice for this item although not free of charge
External manufacturer code name or number
Period flag for shelf life expiration date
Conditions for item although no invoice
Posting logic in the case of stock transfers
Issuing storage location for stock transport order
Reason for rejection of quotations and sales orders
CRM sales order number for TPOP
CRM sales order item number in TPOP
CRM reference order number for TPOP
CRM reference sales order item number in TPOP
Stock type of source storage location in STO
No transmission of cumulative quantities in SA release
Store return with inbound and outbound delivery
Real-time consumption posting of subcontracting components
Item number of the SD document
Reference item for remaining qty cancellation
Flag for putting back from grouped PO document

formula.value: COALESCE(EKKN.ZEKKN, '00')

CASE WHEN EKKO.STATU = '' THEN 'No Quotation Exists/Not Created via Sales' WHEN EKKO.STATU = 'A' THEN 'Quotation Exists in Case of RFQ Item' WHEN EKKO.STATU = 'F' THEN 'Created via Production Order' WHEN EKKO.STATU = 'V' THEN 'Created via Sales document' WHEN EKKO.STATU = 'W' THEN 'Created via Allocation Table' ELSE CAST(NULL AS STRING) END

CASE WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '01' THEN 'Version in process' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '02' THEN 'Active' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '03' THEN 'In release' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '04' THEN 'Partially released' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '05' THEN 'Release completed' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '08' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '11' THEN 'In Distribution' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '12' THEN 'Error in Distribution' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '13' THEN 'Distributed' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '26' THEN 'In external approval' WHEN EKKO.FRGZU = '14' THEN 'In Preparation' ELSE CAST(NULL AS STRING) END
COALESCE(EKPO.NETPR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETPR)
COALESCE(EKPO.NETPR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETPR) * CONV.UKURS
COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR)

description.value: Net order value in PO currency

formula.value: COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR) * CONV.UKURS

description.value: Net order value in PO currency USD

formula.value: COALESCE(EKKN.BRTWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.BRTWR, EKPO.BRTWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.BRTWR)

description.value: Gross order value in PO currency

formula.value: COALESCE(EKKN.BRTWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.BRTWR, EKPO.BRTWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.BRTWR) * CONV.UKURS

description.value: Gross order value in PO currency USD

formula.value: CASE WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '0' THEN 'Standard' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '1' THEN 'Limit' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '2' THEN 'Consignment' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '3' THEN 'Subcontracting' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '4' THEN 'Material unknown' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '5' THEN 'Third-party' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '6' THEN 'Text' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '7' THEN 'Stock transfer' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '8' THEN 'Material group' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = '9' THEN 'Service' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = 'A' THEN 'Enhanced Limit' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = 'C' THEN 'Stock prov.by cust.' WHEN EKPO.PSTYP = 'P' THEN 'Return.trans.pack.' ELSE CAST(NULL AS STRING) END

description.value: Item category in purchasing document description

formula.value: CASE WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'A' THEN 'Request for quotation' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'B' THEN 'Purchase requisition' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'F' THEN 'Purchase order' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'I' THEN 'Info record' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'K' THEN 'Contract' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'L' THEN 'Scheduling agreement' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'Q' THEN 'Service entry sheet' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'W' THEN 'Source list' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'S' THEN 'Simplified service entry sheet' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'R' THEN 'Request for Quotation' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'O' THEN 'Quotation' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'N' THEN 'Central Request for Quotation' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'T' THEN 'Central Quotation' WHEN EKPO.BSTYP = 'C' THEN 'Central Contract' ELSE CAST(NULL AS STRING) END
COALESCE(EKKN.EFFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.EFFWR, EKPO.EFFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.EFFWR)
COALESCE(EKKN.EFFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.EFFWR, EKPO.EFFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.EFFWR) * CONV.UKURS
COALESCE(EKPO.BONBA * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.BONBA)
COALESCE(EKPO.MENGE, 0) - COALESCE(GoodsReceipt.MENGE, 0)
COALESCE(GoodsReceipt.WRBTR * TCURX.currency_fix, GoodsReceipt.WRBTR)
COALESCE(GoodsReceipt.WRBTR * TCURX.currency_fix, GoodsReceipt.WRBTR) * CONV.UKURS
COALESCE(COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR), 0) - COALESCE(COALESCE(GoodsReceipt.WRBTR * TCURX.currency_fix, GoodsReceipt.WRBTR), 0)

(COALESCE(COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR), 0) - COALESCE(COALESCE(GoodsReceipt.WRBTR * TCURX.currency_fix, GoodsReceipt.WRBTR), 0)) * CONV.UKURS
COALESCE(EKPO.MENGE, 0) - COALESCE(InvoiceReceipt.MENGE, 0)
COALESCE(InvoiceReceipt.REFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, InvoiceReceipt.REFWR)
COALESCE(InvoiceReceipt.REFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, InvoiceReceipt.REFWR) * CONV.UKURS

COALESCE(COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR), 0) - COALESCE(COALESCE(InvoiceReceipt.REFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, InvoiceReceipt.REFWR), 0)

(COALESCE(COALESCE(EKKN.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKKN.NETWR, EKPO.NETWR * TCURX.currency_fix, EKPO.NETWR), 0) - COALESCE(COALESCE(InvoiceReceipt.REFWR * TCURX.currency_fix, InvoiceReceipt.REFWR), 0)) * CONV.UKURS
